1.0.name: wordpress/authenticated-twitter-widget
1.0.description:
Extension of the Wickett Twitter Widget to include Authenticated Twitter API calls.

Display the latest Tweets from your Twitter accounts inside WordPress widgets using Twitter authenticated API calls. Customize Tweet displays using your site or theme CSS.

Optionally use Authenticated API calls (up to 350/hr opposed to 150/hr unauthenticated calls). Customize the number of tweets displayed. Filter out @replies from your displayed tweets. Optionally include retweets. The widget plugin automatically links usernames, lists, and hashtags mentioned in Tweets to keep your readers on top of the full conversation.
